attributes.action: Scrap the second home allowance/expenses for ALL MPs.
attributes.additional_details: This eliminates the possibility of erroneous expense claims for second homes and their upkeep. The UK tax payer does not loose money when second homes are sold for profit after funding for their second home improvements and renovations.
attributes.background: MPs are doing work for the state and therefore the state should provide accommodation in a centralised secure location. Managed and owned by the state.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
